name: Wick Episodes
description:
The game is a 3D top-down shooter. The player begins his journey as a freelancer in the underworld, gradually gaining fame and receives more and more lucrative orders. 

The mission is a set of small maps - the size can be viewed in the game Hitman Go, with randomization - presented in the test build in the form of a different location of the enemy. The end result of the mission is the elimination of a specific target, this is possible in several ways: shoot, blow up, set up an accident. 

Also on the map, the player is given a limited ammunition, designed for a certain number of enemies. In the technical demo, this is 3 rounds. To kill an enemy or kill a player, one shot is enough, the closest analogue is Hotline Miami.

All these conditions create a kind of analogue of strategic gameplay.
